description: This file contains tests for utility functions related to redirects, including getFrontendOrigin, isSafeRedirect, and normalizeToPath.

methods.name: getFrontendOrigin
methods.description: Retrieves the frontend origin URL, expected to be a string matching origin pattern.

methods.name: isSafeRedirect
methods.description: Checks whether the provided URL uses a safe scheme for redirection.

methods.name: normalizeToPath
methods.description: Normalizes a full URL to a path with search and hash components.
